19117750111
persons shall look solely to the Corporation for the payment of any claim under or for the
performance of that instrument. The omission of the foregoing exculpatory language from
any instrument shall not affect the validity or enforceability of such instrument and shall not
render any director, officer, employee or agent liable thereunder to any third party, nor shall
any director, officer, employee or agent of the Corporation be liable to anyone for such
omission. No amendment of these Articles of Incorporation or repeal of any of its provisions
shall limit or eliminate the limitation of liability provided to directors and officers hereunder
with respect to any act or omission occurring prior to such amendment or repeal.
(c) The Corporation shall indemnify (i) its directors and officers, whether
serving the Corporation or at its request any other entity, to the full extent required or
permitted by the laws of the State of Texas applicable to ordinary business corporations now
or hereafter in force, including the advance of expenses under the procedures and to the full
extent permitted by such laws, and ii) the employees and agents of the Corporation to such
extent as shall be authorized by the directors or the bylaws of the Corporation and as
permitted by law. Nothing contained herein shall be construed to protect any person against
any liability to the extent such protection would violate Texas statutory or decisional law
applicable to corporations organized in Texas The foregoing rights of indemnification shall
not be exclusive of any other rights to which whose seeking indemnification may be entitled.
The directors may take such action as is necessary to carry out these indemnification

adopted by the directors in the bylaws or by resolution or set forth in Article 2.35-1 of the
Texas Business Corporation Act, as amended, the Corporation (which, for purposes of this
Article 7(d), shall include the Corporation and any of its subsidiaries) may enter into any
contract or transaction of any kind with any person, including any director, officer, employee
I agent of the Corporation or any person affiliated with the Corporation or a director
fficer, employee or agent of the Corporation, whether or not any of them has a financia
interest in such transaction.
